name: Broom of Flying
description: This wooden broom is the perfect transportation for a witch or other small creature. You can use an Bonus Action to speak the command word and throw the broom on the ground, whereupon it immediately transforms into a Medium magical mount. It has a flying speed of 50 feet and can carry up to 300 pounds. It disappears in a puff of smoke when you dismount or speak the command word again.
